thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: Garth Cooper

author: Garth Cooper
title: Garth Cooper
text:
I did an order am one morning and it was in my overseas account before I woke up the following morning. Just brilliant service.
I looked else where for better rates but I didn't find any company that offered a better rate.
happy customer, I have been using OFX for 5 yrs with about 4 transactions per year and this was the best service and quickest service I have had this far.
